Reign and Title

Original Name: Mu'azzam.
Title: 'Shahe-be-khabar' (by historian Khafi Khan).
After Aurangzeb's death, at the age of 63, he ascended the throne by defeating his brother Azam in the Battle of Jajau. He adopted a policy of conciliation. He released Shahu (Shivaji's grandson) from Mughal captivity and maintained good relations with Guru Gobind Singh Ji.
